title: The length of your name
body: Hi, I would like to change my name to Luxanna Crownguard, but it has 18 letters including the space. I can only have 16 so I was wondering if you could possibly increase the limit please. My name is skyfry in the game

replies.body: I really love that name and I wish would could help, but there's no way of exceeding the character limit even if we wanted to.  Creating a name is really hard, I seriously spent the most amount of time during character creation of any game trying to decide on a name.  I wish you the best in selecting one that fits the limit!

If I may make a suggestion, try removing one of the n's in Luxanna and either remove the space between the first and last name or remove the u in guard. It may not be perfect or ideal but it would still be read as Luxanna Crownguard, just shortened by a letter or two.
